content: {"locationId": "13179", "organizationId": "10318", "name": "Connection Church", "address1": "2938 North Ave # C2", "address2": "", "city": "Grand Junction", "state": "CO", "zipCode": "81504", "country": null, "phone": "970-523-1857", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "39.07823", "longitude": "-108.50754", "foodPrograms": "Food Pantry", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "Connection Church is a non-denominatioal church committed to the goal of helping each other connect to God, connect to one another and connect to our community.  It is in the spirit of this vision that we offer food boxes to those who need some assistance each month.  Our desire to to show each person who comes into contact with any of the ministries of Connection Church that they are valued and loved.
